author: Elastic
attributes.description: Identifies potential malicious activity by spotting multiple hosts in an RDP session.
attributes.name: Multiple hosts identified in an RDP session
attributes.query: process.Ext.authentication_id :* and process.Ext.session_info.client_address:* and host.ip:* and process.Ext.session_info.logon_type:"RemoteInteractive"  and event.category :"process"
